subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With the Yankees missing the playoffs for a second consecutive season, Hal Steinbrenner, the team’s managing general partner, borrowed his father’s tactic from the aftermath of the 1981 World Series and apologized to fans.
snippet: With the Yankees missing the playoffs for a second consecutive season, Hal Steinbrenner, the team’s managing general partner, borrowed his father’s tactic from the aftermath of the 1981 World Series and apologized to fans.
